translation: Somewhere Nyaya Shastra, somewhere Mimansa Shasta and somewhere Tarak Shastra (logic) were studied;

gurmukhi: khUM Agin bwxI pVY bHm AsqRM ]
translation: Somewhere the manyras of fire-shafts and Brahm-astras were recited;

transliteration: Kahoon Agad(i) Baant Padai Brahm Astran||
translation: Somewhere Yoga Shastra and somewhere Samkhya Shastra was read;
The cycle of the treasure of fourteen learnings was studied.6.277.
Somewhere Maha Bhashaya of Patanjalli and somewhere the Komudi of Panini was studied;
Somewhere Siddhant Komudi, somewhere Chandrika and somewhere Sarsut were read;
Somewhere other grammatical works including that of Vaisheshika were discussed;
Somewhere Kasika commentaries on Panini Grammar Prakriya were being churned.7.278.
Somewhere someone studied the book Manorama;

gurmukhi: khUM gwie sMgIq mY gIq nwcY ]
transliteration: Kahoon Gade Saneet Mai Geet Naachai||
translation: Somewhere someone sang in musical mode and danced;

gurmukhi: khUM ssqR kI srb ibidAw ibcwrY ]
translation: Somewhere someone ruminated on the learning of all weapons;

gurmukhi: khUM AsqR ibidAw bwcY sok twrY ]8]279]
transliteration: Kahoon Astra Bidiaa Baachai Sok Tdarai||8||279||
translation: Somewhere someone was removing anxiety by studying the science of warfare. 8.279.

gurmukhi: khUM gdw ko juD kY kY idKwvY ]
transliteration: Kahoon Gadaa Ko Judh Kai Kai Dikhaavai||
translation: Somewhere someone exhibited the war-fighting of maces;

gurmukhi: khUM KVg ibidAw juJY mwnu pwvY ]
transliteration: Kahoon Khadag Bidiaa Jujhai Maan(u) Paavai||
translation: Somewhere someone received the award in sword-fighting;
